alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Okaloosa and southeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 211 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Mary Esther, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Eglin AFB, Mary Esther, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Navarre, Shalimar, Cinco Bayou and Navarre Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
